content.prompt: how many employees in this company with the highest salary.  You're provided a json data assigned to a variable. only use simple code, for loops
content.source_code:
import json

data = [
    {"name": "John", "salary": 35000},
    {"name": "Sarah", "salary": 25000},
    {"name": "James", "salary": 45000},
    {"name": "Emily", "salary": 45000}
]


highest_salary = 0
count = 0
for employee in data:
    if employee["salary"] > highest_salary:
        highest_salary = employee["salary"]
        count += 1


print(count)
